video_prompt: A steampunk-clad anime character, subtly shifts posture, a confident gaze. Her long blonde hair flows slightly. Gears on her hat subtly click. Her rifle is minimally adjusted. Her gloved fingers twitch.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Full-body anime steampunk android/humaness, long blonde hair, confident gaze, holding vintage rifle. Wearing: wide-brimmed hat with golden gears, white off-shoulder puff-sleeved blouse with cleavage and black bow, dark brown laced corset, brown belt with golden buckles, dark green pleated mini-skirt, tall brown lace-up boots, decorative golden garter on right thigh. Stark black background.
refined_video_prompt: Posture subtly shifts. A confident gaze holds steady. Hair flows slightly. Gears on a hat subtly click. A rifle is minimally adjusted. Fingers twitch.
